entry.title: Solution Accelerators | Microsoft US
entry.summary: Solution Accelerators are repeatable solutions that can be quickly and easily implemented for specific business outcomes to accelerate transformation journey.

entry.title: Hands-On-Lab- Azure Purview Workshop
entry.summary: Hands-on-Lab to explore the functionality of Azure Purview, a unified data governance service that helps you manage and govern your on-premises, multi-cloud and software-as-a-service (SaaS) data.

entry.title: Reusable Technology Accelerator- Azure Purview Demo Generator
entry.summary: Automate the deployment of a pre-populated Azure Purview demo environment.

entry.title: Hands-On-Lab- Azure Cognitive Search Hands-On-Lab
entry.summary: Self-paced workshop that teaches you everything you need to know to get up and running with Azure Cognitive Search quickly.

entry.title: Solution Accelerator- Workplace Intelligence for Product Development Teams
entry.summary: Uncover and leverage the key drivers of productivity and success for product development teams

entry.title: Solution Accelerator- Workplace Intelligence for Human Resources
entry.summary: Easily identify factors that influence productivity and engagement

entry.title: Reusable Technology Accelerator- Virtual Assistant Deployer
entry.summary: Deploy a Microsoft Virtual Assistant Solution without needing to install all the prerequisite tools on your own machine

entry.title: Solution Accelerator- Travel Marketplace
entry.summary: Decentralized, managed marketplace platform for transacting between multiple individuals or organizations.

entry.title: Reusable Technology Accelerator- Tradable Digital Assets
entry.summary: Enable traditional assets to be easily digitalized (tokenized), exchanged as a token, and securely stored in digital wallets

entry.title: Solution Accelerator- Many Models - Demand Forecasting

entry.summary: Extract business or industry specific terms from documents, such as extracting medical terms from medical documents, legal terms from contracts, or part names from engineering documents

entry.summary: Reduce human intervention and decrease the time to find the key Data points in 100+page documents/contracts
